welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bensville, a charming city known for its historic landmarks and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serving mainly domestic flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal A/B/C (South)
terminals.description: Serving mainly domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
